PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-11262023-11-09PMO
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectAmendment to the Mandate of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments
PrecisOrder amending the Mandate of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments in order to set that members of the Advisory Board are to be appointed for a term not exceeding three years
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Amendment to the Mandate of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments
precis: Order amending the Mandate of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments in order to set that members of the Advisory Board are to be appointed for a term not exceeding three years
